Location, Location, Location!

Ideally situated just minutes west of Green Bay, adjacent to Highway 29 with quick access to US 41, Hobart Crossing offers gracious living close to all the fun and services you need ...

  • Just 13 minutes from Austin Straubel International Airport
  • 10 minutes from all the action at Lambeau Field and the Resch Center
  • Less than 15 minutes to Bay Park Square shopping mall, downtown’s historic Broadway District, hospitals and more
  • Just 15 minutes to UWGB and 7 minutes to NWTC
  • Close to amazing golf at Thornberry Creek, Brown County, Village Green and Oneida Country Club.

Don't delay—units will fill fast!

About Hobart Crossing

There’s an exciting place to call home in the greater Green Bay area, Hobart Crossing. Amenities include a large outdoor pool area with grills and lounging space, roomy fitness center outfitted with professional equipment and a spacious clubroom. Each apartment includes granite countertops, in-unit washer/dryer and upgraded appliances.
